page.title: 04SOCIAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: For the{preschool children}a playgroup meets twice weekly in the village hall.Here children between three and five years meet and play together in the care of a playleader who is a local mother herself. For the older children there is a junior badminton club and a Scout pack The{women}may meet at the Womens Guild or the Womens Rural Institute. Many activities take place in the village hall.The Hall Trustees are responsible for the maintenance of this building. The Playing Field Association oversee the outdoor{recreation}area which has swings and slide as well as a football pitch.On another site are tennis courts and bowling green. The{pensioners}have their own Social Club,a committee organises a Christmas Party for them each year.
